items.basicinformationcomments: Adjustments $/kWh = Cost of Power Adjustment($0.1122) + Power Cost Equalization(Only for first 500 kWh $-0.4884) = $-0.37622
items.description:
Residential service to individual private dwellings, farms, or apartments.

SPECIAL PROVISIONS:
When a customer operates a commercial establishment (incidental to his residence) in
the same building or on the same premises as his residence and takes his entire service
through one meter, this rate schedule will apply for the entire service only if the connected
load in the residential portion exceeds that in the commercial portion providing that the
connected load in the commercial portion does not exceed 1,500 watts. If the reverse is
true the approximate commercial rate will apply to the entire service. However, the
customer may elect to take service under both the residential and commercial rates, in
which case there will be a separate meter for the residential portion and a separate meter
for the commercial portion.
items.energycomments: Adjustments = Power Cost Equalization Credit (only applicable to the first 500 kWh) + Cost of Power Adjustment + Regulatory Cost Charge
items.name: Permanent Residential Rates
